title: Air Conditioned, Laundry Facility, Private Entrance
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-Air Conditioned', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-Package Acceptance', '-Upgraded Units Available', '-Private Entrance', '-Radiant Baseboard Heat', '-Laundry Facility', '-Additional Storage', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', '-Picture Windows with Courtyard Views', '-No Security Deposit Required', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability is subject to change.']
